Much salt much rage, sweet water..

I'm really sad about how this game went from a super toxic, but still a fun and skill based game to a free to play game with battle royal. I don't even know why the fuck it went free to play. There were so many problems with smurfs etc even when the game had to be purchased. But now? Now it's just a toxic game, which isn't fun at all. 

I guess I don't even have to talk about the rank system now days... and it was also shitty before but now it's just a completely joke.

I'm disappointed. It was my favourite game but it isn't doing well now.
I recommend this game to play cause the graphics is cool also the most thing about this game is startegy its fun to play this Game :)
